attributes.action: Students who do gcses to resit the year at school due to covid 19
attributes.additional_details: I would like a course at school designed to cover the year 10 and all the content they have missed during covid 19 I would like the school to recognise that some of the children as a result of covid 19 have not made enough learning time and won’t make the gcse grades to continue higher education some children’s mental health may be at risk and also some children may not have had the chance to do the online learning I feel if they do not do well in the gcses which are graded by schools they should be offered a one year course within the school to cover content missed and then stand a better chance.
attributes.background: I would like the children who have lost a year of school due to covid to have equal opportunities and to be able to resit the year.
